WORKER_NOT_INITIALIZED.title: Worker Error
WORKER_NOT_INITIALIZED.message:
Worker is not initialized.
Please refresh the page.

WORKER_CREATION_FAILED.title: Worker Creation Failed
WORKER_CREATION_FAILED.message:
Failed to create worker.
Please refresh the page.

WORKER_ERROR.title: Worker Error
WORKER_ERROR.message: An error occurred in the worker.

WASM_LOADING.title: WASM Loading
WASM_LOADING.message:
WASM is loading.
Please try again later.

WASM_NOT_READY.title: WASM Not Ready
WASM_NOT_READY.message:
WASM is not ready yet.
Please try again later.

FILE_PROCESSING_FAILED.title: File Processing Failed
FILE_PROCESSING_FAILED.message: An error occurred while processing the file.

FILE_READ_ERROR.title: File Read Error
FILE_READ_ERROR.message: An error occurred while reading the file.

FILE_READ_FAILED.title: File Read Failed
FILE_READ_FAILED.message:
Cannot read the file.
The file may be corrupted or in an unsupported format.

FILE_TOO_LARGE.title: File Too Large
FILE_TOO_LARGE.message:
The file is too large.
The maximum supported size is 100MB.

EXIF_PARSE_ERROR.title: EXIF Parse Error
EXIF_PARSE_ERROR.message: An error occurred while parsing EXIF data.

EXIF_PROCESSING_TIMEOUT.title: EXIF Processing Timeout
EXIF_PROCESSING_TIMEOUT.message:
EXIF data processing timed out.
Please try again.

SEARCH_TIMEOUT.title: Search Timeout
SEARCH_TIMEOUT.message:
Search timed out.
Please try again.

SEARCH_WASM_ERROR.title: WASM Search Error
SEARCH_WASM_ERROR.message: An error occurred during WASM search.

SEARCH_INVALID_HEX.title: Invalid HEX
SEARCH_INVALID_HEX.message: Please enter a valid hexadecimal (0-9, A-F).

SEARCH_OFFSET_OUT_OF_RANGE.title: Offset Out of Range
SEARCH_OFFSET_OUT_OF_RANGE.message: Offset is out of file range.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.title: Unknown Error
UNKNOWN_ERROR.message:
An unknown error occurred.
Please try again.

IP_FETCH_FAILED.title: IP Fetch Failed
IP_FETCH_FAILED.message: Failed to retrieve your IP address.
